TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TreeView extends System.Windows.Forms.Control

summary.span: 显示标记项的分层集合，每个标记项用一个 来表示。

span.span: Displays a hierarchical collection of labeled items, each represented by a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合包含分配给 控件的所有 对象。The collection holds all the objects that are assigned to the control. 此集合中的树节点称为根树节点。The tree nodes in this collection are referred to as the root tree nodes. 随后添加到根树节点的任何树节点称为子节点。Any tree node that is subsequently added to a root tree node is referred to as a child node. 由于每个 可以包含其他 对象的集合，因此在循环访问集合时，您可能会发现很难确定树结构中的位置。Because each can contain a collection of other objects, you might find it difficult to determine your location in the tree structure when you iterate through the collection. 您可以使用 字符串值来分析 字符串，以确定 标签开始和结束的位置。You can parse the string by using the string value to determine where a label begins and ends. 您可以通过将 分配给 属性并引用 中的 的索引值来指定该 ，从而在树节点旁显示图像。You can display images next to the tree nodes by assigning an to the property and referencing the index value of an in the to assign that . 使用以下属性来分配图像：Use the following properties to assign images: - 将 属性设置为不选择树节点时要显示的 的索引值。Set the property to the index value of the that you want to display when a tree node is not selected. - 将 属性设置为选择树节点时要显示的 的索引值。Set the property to the index value of the that you want to display when a tree node is selected. 和 属性值引用的图像是分配给 集合的所有树节点显示的默认图像。The images referenced by the and property values are the default images displayed by all the tree nodes that are assigned to the collection. 单个树节点可以通过设置 "" 和 "" 属性来重写默认图像。Individual tree nodes can override the default images by setting the and properties. 默认情况下， 中显示的状态图像是 16 x 16 像素。The state images displayed in the are 16 x 16 pixels by default. 设置 的 属性将不会影响图像的显示方式。Setting the property of the will have no effect on how the images are displayed. 但是，当 app.config 文件包含以下项时，将根据系统 DPI 设置调整状态图像的大小：However, the state images are resized according to the system DPI setting when the app.config file contains the following entry: ```xml ``` 可以展开树节点以显示子树节点的下一级。Tree nodes can be expanded to display the next level of child tree nodes. 如果 旁边显示一个加号（+）按钮，则用户可以通过单击加号（+）按钮展开 ; 也可以通过调用 方法来扩展 。The user can expand the by clicking the plus-sign (+) button, if one is displayed next to the , or you can expand the by calling the method. 若要展开 集合中的所有子树节点级别，请调用 方法。To expand all the child tree node levels in the collection, call the method. 您可以通过调用 方法折叠子 级别，或者，如果在 旁显示了减号（-）按钮，用户可以按减号（-）按钮。You can collapse the child level by calling the method, or the user can press the minus-sign (-) button, if one is displayed next to the . 还可以调用 方法，以便在展开和折叠状态之间切换。You can also call the method to alternate between the expanded and collapsed states. 树节点可以选择性地显示复选框。Tree nodes can optionally display check boxes. 若要显示复选框，请将 的 属性设置为 "`true`"。To display the check boxes, set the property of the to `true`. 对于处于选中状态的树节点， 属性设置为 `true`。The property is set to `true` for tree nodes that are in a checked state. > [!NOTE] > 如果从 或 事件中设置 属性，则会导致多次引发事件，并可能导致意外的行为。Setting the property from within the or event causes the event to be raised multiple times and can result in unexpected behavior. 例如，在递归更新子节点时，可以在事件处理程序中设置 属性，这样用户就不必单独展开和检查每个节点。For example, you might set the property in the event handler when you are recursively updating the child nodes so that the user does not have to expand and check each one individually. 若要防止多次引发事件，请将逻辑添加到事件处理程序，该处理程序只会在 的 属性设置为 时执行递归代码。To prevent the event from being raised multiple times, add logic to your event handler that only executes your recursive code if the property of the is not set to . 有关如何执行此操作的示例，请参阅 或 事件的 "示例" 部分。For an example of how to do this, see the Example section of the or events. 可以通过设置其某些显示和样式属性来更改 控件的外观。You can change the appearance of the control by setting some of its display and style properties. 将 设置为 `true` 会在每个可分别展开或折叠的 旁显示加号或减号按钮。Setting to `true` displays a plus-sign or minus-sign button next to each that can be expanded or collapsed, respectively. 将 属性设置为 "`true` 会导致 显示将所有根树节点联接在一起的行。Setting the property to `true` causes the to display lines that join all the root tree nodes together. 您可以通过将 属性设置为 `true`，来显示将子树节点连接到根节点的行。You can display lines that connect child tree nodes to their root node by setting the property to `true`. 当鼠标指针移过树节点标签时，将 属性设置为 `true` 更改树节点标签的外观。Setting the property to `true` changes the appearance of the tree node labels as the mouse pointer passes over them. 当热跟踪时，树节点标签将采用超链接的外观。When hot-tracked, the tree node labels take on the appearance of a hyperlink. 还可以完全自定义 控件的外观。You can also completely customize the appearance of the control. 为此，请将 属性设置为除 以外的值并处理 事件。To do this, set the property to a value other than and handle the event. > [!NOTE] > 在运行时设置 、、和 属性时，将重新创建 句柄（请参阅 ）以更新控件的外观。When setting the , , , and properties at run time, the handle is recreated (see ) to update the control's appearance. 这将导致所有树节点均折叠，所选 除外。This causes all tree nodes to be collapsed, except for the selected . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 控件。The following code example demonstrates the use of the control. [!code-csharp[TreeViewMisc#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewMisc/cs/form1.cs#10)] [!code-vb[TreeViewMisc#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewMisc/vb/form1.vb#10)] 下面更复杂的代码示例在 控件中显示客户信息。The following, more complex code example displays customer information in a control. 根树节点显示客户名称，子树节点显示分配给每个客户的订单号。The root tree nodes display customer names, and the child tree nodes display the order numbers assigned to each customer. 在此示例中，1000客户显示每个订单15个订单。In this example, 1,000 customers are displayed with 15 orders each. 使用 和 方法取消重画 ，并在 创建并绘制 对象时显示等待 。The repainting of the is suppressed by using the and methods, and a wait is displayed while the creates and paints the objects. 此示例要求您有一个可以容纳 `Order` 对象集合的 `Customer` 对象。This example requires that you have a `Customer` object that can hold a collection of `Order` objects. 它还要求在应用程序目录中有一个名为 `MyWait.cur` 的光标文件，并且已在 上创建 控件的实例。It also requires that you have a cursor file that is named `MyWait.cur` in the application directory and that you have created an instance of a control on a . [!code-cpp[TreeView#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeView/CPP/treeview.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[TreeView#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeView/CS/treeview.cs#1)] [!code-vb[TreeView#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeView/VB/treeview.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何更改 的折叠状态，以便所有选中的节点可见。The following code example demonstrates how to change the collapse state of a so that all the checked nodes are visible. 首先，展开所有节点，并为 事件添加处理程序。First, all the nodes are expanded, and a handler is added for the event. 接下来，折叠所有节点。Next, all the nodes are collapsed. 事件处理程序确定给定节点是否包含已选中的子节点。The event handler determines whether a given node has child nodes that are checked. 如果某个节点已选中子级，则会取消该节点的折叠。If a node has checked children, the collapse is canceled for that node. 若要在单击节点旁边的减号时允许标准节点折叠，则会删除 事件处理程序。In order to allow standard node collapse when the minus sign next to a node is clicked, the event handler is then removed. 此行为还可通过处理 事件来实现，如该主题的示例中所示。This behavior can also be implemented by handling the event, as illustrated in the example for that topic. remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例允许用户使用 编辑 nonroot 树节点。The following code example lets the user edit nonroot tree nodes by using a . 当用户右键单击鼠标时，将确定该位置的 ，并将其存储在名为 `mySelectedNode` 的变量中。When the user right clicks the mouse, the at that position is determined and stored in a variable named `mySelectedNode`. 如果选择了 nonroot 树节点，则会将其置于可编辑状态，从而允许用户编辑节点标签。If a nonroot tree node was selected, it is put into an editable state, which allows the user to edit the node label. 用户停止编辑树节点标签后，将计算并保存新的标签文本。After the user stops editing the tree node label, the new label text is evaluated and saved. 在此示例中，多个字符在标签文本中被视为无效。For this example, several characters are considered not valid in the label text. 如果标签字符串中有一个无效字符，或者字符串为空，则会向用户发送错误通知，并将标签返回到其之前的文本。If one of the invalid characters is in the label string, or the string is empty, the user is notified of the error and the label is returned to its previous text. [!code-cpp[classic treenode.beginedit example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TreeNode.BeginEdit Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[classic treenode.beginedit example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TreeNode.BeginEdit Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[classic treenode.beginedit example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TreeNode.BeginEdit Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要在每次向 添加项时保持性能，请调用 方法。To maintain performance while items are added one at a time to the , call the method. 方法阻止控件绘制，直到调用 方法。The method prevents the control from painting until the method is called. 向树视图控件添加项的首选方法是使用 方法将树节点项的数组添加到树视图中。The preferred way to add items to a tree view control is to use the method to add an array of tree node items to a tree view. 但是，如果要一次添加一个项，请使用 方法，以防止在添加操作期间 控件被绘制。However, if you want to add items one at a time, use the method to prevent the control from painting during the add operations. 若要允许控件继续绘制，请在将所有树节点添加到树视图时调用 方法。To allow the control to resume painting, call the method when all the tree nodes have been added to the tree view. ## Examples 下面的代码示例在 控件中显示客户信息。The following code example displays customer information in a control. 根树节点显示客户名称，子树节点显示分配给每个客户的订单号。The root tree nodes display customer names, and the child tree nodes display the order numbers assigned to each customer. 在此示例中，1000客户显示每个订单15个订单。In this example, 1,000 customers are displayed with 15 orders each. 使用 和 方法取消重画 ，并在 创建并绘制 对象时显示等待 。The repainting of the is suppressed by using the and methods, and a wait is displayed while the creates and paints the objects. 此示例要求您有一个可以容纳 `Order` 对象集合的 `Customer` 对象。This example requires that you have a `Customer` object that can hold a collection of `Order` objects. 它还要求在应用程序目录中有一个名为 `MyWait.cur` 的光标文件，并且已在 上创建 控件的实例。It also requires that you have a cursor file that is named `MyWait.cur` in the application directory and that you have created an instance of a control on a . remarks.format: ## Remarks 在树节点标签和树节点 （如果有）的左侧显示复选框。A check box is displayed to the left of both the tree node label and tree node , if any. 允许用户一次选择多个树节点的复选框。Check boxes allow the user to select more than one tree node at a time. 当 的 属性设置为 `true`，并设置 属性时， 中包含的每个 都将显示 中的第一个和第二个图像，以指示未选中或选中状态分别.When the property of a is set to `true`, and the property is set, each that is contained in the displays the first and second images from the to indicate an unchecked or checked state, respectively. 但是，如果出现以下情况，则显示的图像可能会不同：如果将节点 设置为0或1以外的值，并且父 的 属性设置为 `false`， 不会自动重置为-1 以指示未设置。However, the displayed images may be different if the following situation occurs: If the of the node is set to a value other than 0 or 1, and the property of the parent is set to `false`, the will not automatically reset to -1 to indicate it is not set. 在这种情况下，将显示指示的索引位置处的状态图像。In this case, the state image at the indicated index position is shown. 如果 设置为再次 `true`，则将显示 的第一个和第二个图像，分别指示选中或未选中状态。If is set to `true` again, the first and second images of the are shown to indicate a checked or unchecked state, respectively. > [!NOTE] > 在运行时设置 属性时，将重新创建 句柄（请参阅 ）以更新控件的外观。When setting the property at run time, the handle is recreated (see ) to update the control's appearance. 这会导致所有树节点均折叠，但所选 除外。This causes all tree nodes to be collapsed, with the exception of the selected . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何更改 的折叠状态，以便所有选中的节点可见。The following code example demonstrates how to change the collapse state of a so that all the checked nodes are visible. 首先，折叠所有节点，并为 事件添加处理程序。First, all the nodes are collapsed, and a handler is added for the event. 接下来，展开所有节点。Next, all the nodes are expanded. 事件处理程序确定给定节点是否包含已选中的子节点。The event handler determines whether a given node has child nodes that are checked. 如果某个节点没有选中的子级，则会取消该节点的展开。If a node does not have checked children, the expansion is canceled for that node. 若要在单击节点旁边的加号时允许标准节点扩展，则会删除 事件处理程序。In order to allow standard node expansion when the plus sign next to a node is clicked, the event handler is then removed. 此行为还可通过处理 事件来实现，如该主题的示例中所示。This behavior can also be implemented by handling the event, as illustrated in the example for that topic. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法折叠所有 对象，包括 控件中的所有子树节点。The method collapses all the objects, which includes all the child tree nodes, that are in the control. > [!NOTE] > 的状态将保持不变。The state of a persists. 例如，假设为根树节点调用 方法。For example, suppose that you call the method for a root tree node. 如果子树节点之前未折叠，它们将显示为先前展开的状态。If the child tree nodes were not previously collapsed, they will appear in their previously-expanded state. 调用 方法可确保所有树节点都显示为折叠状态。Calling the method ensures that all the tree nodes appear in the collapsed state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何更改 的折叠状态，以便所有选中的节点可见。The following code example demonstrates how to change the collapse state of a so that all the checked nodes are visible. 首先，折叠所有节点，并为 事件添加处理程序。First, all the nodes are collapsed, and a handler is added for the event. 接下来，展开所有节点。Next, all the nodes are expanded. 事件处理程序确定给定节点是否包含已选中的子节点。The event handler determines whether a given node has child nodes that are checked. 如果某个节点没有选中的子级，则会取消该节点的展开。If a node does not have checked children, the expansion is canceled for that node. 若要在单击节点旁边的加号时允许标准节点扩展，则会删除 事件处理程序。In order to allow standard node expansion when the plus sign next to a node is clicked, the event handler is then removed. 此行为还可通过处理 事件来实现，如该主题的示例中所示。This behavior can also be implemented by handling the event, as illustrated in the example for that topic. 有关完整示例，请参阅 参考主题。For the complete example, see the reference topic. remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常由操作系统绘制 的节点。The nodes of a are typically drawn by the operating system. 属性允许您自定义节点的外观。The property lets you customize the appearance of the nodes. 为此，请将 设置为 或 ，并为 事件提供处理程序。To do this, set to or and provide a handler for the event. 这称为所有者描述。This is called owner drawing. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用所有者描述自定义 控件。The following code example demonstrates how to customize a control using owner drawing. 示例中的 控件在标准节点标签旁边显示可选的节点标记。The control in the example displays optional node tags alongside the standard node labels. 节点标记通过使用 属性来指定。Node tags are specified by using the property. 控件还使用自定义颜色，包括自定义的突出显示颜色。The control also uses custom colors, which include a custom highlight color. 您可以通过设置颜色属性自定义大多数 颜色，但无法将选择突出显示颜色作为属性提供。You can customize most of the colors by setting color properties, but the selection highlight color is not available as a property. 此外，默认选择突出显示矩形仅扩展到节点标签周围。Additionally, the default selection highlight rectangle extends only around a node label. 必须使用所有者绘图来绘制节点标记，并绘制一个足以容纳节点标记的自定义突出显示矩形。Owner drawing must be used to draw the node tags and to draw a customized highlight rectangle large enough to include a node tag. 有关完整示例，请参阅 参考主题。For the complete example, see the reference topic. property is set to values of or . 下表说明了在将 属性设置为这些值时，如何对 进行自定义。The following table indicates how the can be customized when the property is set to these values. |System.windows.forms.drawmode> nodes must be drawn manually if they are desired.| 如果使用 控件的 属性所指定的字体绘制 值所占用的区域，则该区域是可在其中单击该节点的节点。The region that the value would occupy if it were drawn using the font specified by the control's property is the region in which a node can be clicked to select it. 这称为命中测试区域。This is called the hit test region. 如果在此区域外绘制，则应提供自己的代码，以便在单击其可见区域时选择节点。If you draw outside this region, you should provide your own code that selects a node when its visible area is clicked. 使用 时，命中测试区域对应于 属性。The hit test region corresponds to the property when using . 但是，在使用 时， 属性包含整个 宽度。When using , however, the property encompasses the entire width of the . 在这种情况下，可以通过获取 值并访问其 属性来访问命中测试区域。In this case, you can access the hit test region by getting the value and accessing its property. 然后，可以在这些边界内绘制节点的命中测试区域，也可以提供自己的命中测试代码。You can then draw the hit test region of the node within these bounds, or you can provide your own hit test code. 请注意，设置 "" 属性不会更改命中测试区域的大小，该大小是使用为整个 指定的字体计算的。Note that setting the property does not change the size of the hit test region, which is calculated using the font specified for the entire . 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用所有者描述自定义 控件。The following code example demonstrates how to customize a control using owner drawing. 示例中的 控件在标准节点标签旁边显示可选的节点标记。The control in the example displays optional node tags alongside the standard node labels. 节点标记通过使用 属性来指定。Node tags are specified by using the property. 控件还使用自定义颜色，包括自定义的突出显示颜色。The control also uses custom colors, which include a custom highlight color. 您可以通过设置颜色属性自定义大多数 颜色，但无法将选择突出显示颜色作为属性提供。You can customize most of the colors by setting color properties, but the selection highlight color is not available as a property. 此外，默认选择突出显示矩形仅扩展到节点标签周围。Additionally, the default selection highlight rectangle extends only around a node label. 必须使用所有者绘图来绘制节点标记，并绘制一个足以容纳节点标记的自定义突出显示矩形。Owner drawing must be used to draw the node tags and to draw a customized highlight rectangle large enough to include a node tag. 在此示例中， 事件的处理程序手动绘制节点标记和自定义选择突出显示。In the example, a handler for the event draws the node tags and the custom selection highlight manually. 未选定的节点不需要自定义。Unselected nodes do not need customization. 为此， 属性设置为 `true`，以便操作系统绘制它们。For these, the property is set to `true` so that they will be drawn by the operating system. 此外， 事件的处理程序提供命中测试。Additionally, a handler for the event provides hit-testing. 默认情况下，只能通过单击其标签周围的区域来选择节点。By default, a node can be selected only by clicking the region around its label. 事件处理程序选择在此区域内或节点标记周围的区域（如果存在）中单击的节点。The event handler selects a node that is clicked anywhere within this region or within the region around a node tag, if present. remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要在每次向 添加项时保持性能，请调用 方法。To maintain performance while items are added one at a time to the , call the method. 方法阻止控件绘制，直到调用 方法。The method prevents the control from painting until the method is called. 向树视图控件添加项的首选方法是使用 方法将树节点项的数组添加到树视图中。The preferred way to add items to a tree view control is to use the method to add an array of tree node items to a tree view. 但是，如果要一次添加一个项，请使用 方法，以防止在添加操作期间 控件被绘制。However, if you want to add items one at a time, use the method to prevent the control from painting during the add operations. 若要允许控制控件恢复绘制，请在将所有树节点添加到树视图时调用 方法。To allow control the control to resume painting, call the method when all the tree nodes have been added to the tree view. ## Examples 下面的代码示例在 控件中显示客户信息。The following code example displays customer information in a control. 根树节点显示客户名称，子树节点显示分配给每个客户的订单号。The root tree nodes display customer names, and the child tree nodes display the order numbers assigned to each customer. 在此示例中，1000客户显示每个订单15个订单。In this example, 1,000 customers are displayed with 15 orders each. 使用 和 方法取消重画 ，并在 创建并绘制 对象时显示等待 。The repainting of the is suppressed by using the and methods, and a wait is displayed while the creates and paints the objects. 此示例要求您有一个可以容纳 `Order` 对象集合的 `Customer` 对象。This example requires that you have a `Customer` object that can hold a collection of `Order` objects. 它还要求在应用程序目录中有一个名为 `MyWait.cur` 的光标文件，并且已在 上创建 控件的实例。It also requires that you have a cursor file that is named `MyWait.cur` in the application directory and that you have created an instance of a control on a . remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 属性设置为 `true`，则 属性不起作用。If the property is set to `true`, the property has no effect. > [!NOTE] > 如果 属性设置为 `true`，则当鼠标指针移到某个树节点上时，每个树节点标签都将使用超链接的外观。When the property is set to `true`, each tree node label takes on the appearance of a hyperlink as the mouse pointer passes over it. 字体样式应用于 并且 设置为蓝色，以使标签显示为链接。The font style is applied to the and the is set to blue to make the label appear as a link. 此外观不受用户操作系统的 Internet 设置的控制。The appearance is not controlled by the Internet settings of the user's operating system. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示自定义 。The following code example illustrates a customized . 通过继承 类，此自定义版本具有典型 的所有功能。By inheriting the class, this custom version has all the functionality of a typical . 更改构造函数中的各种属性值提供了独特的外观。Changing various property values in the constructor provides a unique appearance. 由于 属性设置为 `false`，因此自定义控件还将重写 方法，以便在单击节点时可以展开和折叠节点。Because the property is set to `false`, the customized control also overrides the method so that nodes can be expanded and collapsed when they are clicked. 以这种方式自定义的控件可以在整个组织中使用，从而可以轻松地提供一致的接口，而无需在每个单独的项目中指定控件属性。A control that is customized in this way can be used throughout an organization, making it easy to provide a consistent interface without requiring the control properties to be specified in each individual project. remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在 控件内启用拖放操作。The following code example demonstrates how to enable drag-and-drop operations within a control. 在此示例中，可以将任何节点拖动到另一个节点，该节点不是已拖动节点的后代。In this example, any node can be dragged to another node that is not a descendant of the dragged node. 拖动的节点（包括其所有子代节点）将成为目标节点的子节点。The dragged node, which includes all its descendant nodes, becomes a child of the destination node. 使用鼠标左键时，拖动的节点将移动到目标节点。When the left mouse button is used, the dragged node is moved to the destination node. 当使用鼠标右键时，所拖动的节点会复制到目标节点。When the right mouse button is used, the dragged node is copied to the destination node. remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当 属性 `true`时， 方法才有效。The method works only if the property is `true`. 如果尝试编辑标签时 `false` ，则会引发异常，并且树节点将不会进入可编辑状态。If is `false` when you attempt to edit the label, an exception will be thrown and the tree node will not be put in to an editable state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例允许用户使用 编辑 nonroot 树节点。The following code example lets the user edit nonroot tree nodes by using a . 当用户右键单击鼠标时，将确定该位置的 ，并将其存储在名为 `mySelectedNode` 的变量中。When the user right clicks the mouse, the at that position is determined and stored in a variable named `mySelectedNode`. 如果选择了 nonroot 树节点，则会将其置于可编辑状态，从而允许用户编辑节点标签。If a nonroot tree node was selected, it is put into an editable state, which allows the user to edit the node label. 用户停止编辑树节点标签后，将计算并保存新的标签文本。After the user stops editing the tree node label, the new label text is evaluated and saved. 在此示例中，多个字符在标签文本中被视为无效。For this example, several characters are considered not valid in the label text. 如果标签字符串中有一个无效字符，或者字符串为空，则会向用户发送错误通知，并将标签返回到其之前的文本。If one of the invalid characters is in the label string, or the string is empty, the user is notified of the error and the label is returned to its previous text. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户使用鼠标双击树节点的任何部分时，将发生此事件，包括指示节点是折叠还是展开状态的加号（+）或减号（-）。This event occurs when the user double-clicks any part of a tree node with the mouse, including the plus sign (+) or minus sign (-) that indicates whether the node is collapsed or expanded. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何处理 事件以及如何使用 。The following code example demonstrates how to handle the event and how to use the . 若要运行此示例，请将代码粘贴到包含名为 `treeView1`的 的 Windows 窗体中。To run this example, paste the code into a Windows Form that contains a named `treeView1`. 用运行该示例的系统的 `c:\` 目录中的文件名称填充 `treeView1`，并将 `treeView1` 的 事件与此示例中的 `treeView1_NodeMouseDoubleClick` 方法相关联。Populate `treeView1` with the names of files located in the `c:\` directory of the system the sample is running on, and associate the event of `treeView1` with the `treeView1_NodeMouseDoubleClick` method in this example. 此示例要求用户在运行该示例的计算机上具有管理员权限。This example requires that the user has administrator privileges on the machine running the example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewWhidbeyMembers#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewWhidbeyMembers/cpp/Form1.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewWhidbeyMembers#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewWhidbeyMembers/CS/Form1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewWhidbeyMembers#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewWhidbeyMembers/VB/Form1.vb#5)]

summary.span: 当鼠标悬停在 上时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the mouse hovers over a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果鼠标位于 上，则 事件将在 事件之前发生。If the mouse is located over a , the event will occur before the event. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告 事件的发生。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解何时发生事件，并可帮助您进行调试。This report helps you learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑将 替换为 或将消息附加到多行 中。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为 `TreeView1` 类型实例的项目中。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `TreeView1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与 事件关联。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. summary.span: 获取分配给树视图控件的树节点集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of tree nodes that are assigned to the tree view control.

value.span: ，表示分配给树视图控件的树节点。

span.span: A that represents the tree nodes assigned to the tree view control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性保存 对象的集合，其中每个对象都有一个 属性，该属性可包含其自身的 。The property holds a collection of objects, each of which has a property that can contain its own . 这种树节点嵌套很难导航树结构，但 属性可以更轻松地确定树结构内的位置。This nesting of tree nodes can make it difficult to navigate a tree structure, but the property makes it easier to determine your location within the tree structure. ## Examples 下面的代码示例在 控件中显示客户信息。The following code example displays customer information in a control. 根树节点显示客户名称，子树节点显示分配给每个客户的订单号。The root tree nodes display customer names, and the child tree nodes display the order numbers assigned to each customer. 在此示例中，1000客户显示每个订单15个订单。In this example, 1,000 customers are displayed with 15 orders each. 使用 和 方法取消重画 ，并在 创建并绘制 对象时显示等待 。The repainting of the is suppressed by using the and methods, and a wait is displayed while the creates and paints the objects. 此示例要求您有一个可以容纳 `Order` 对象集合的 `Customer` 对象。This example requires that you have a `Customer` object that can hold a collection of `Order` objects. 它还要求您已在 上创建 控件的实例。It also requires that you have created an instance of a control on a . remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 设置为 `true`，则将忽略 属性。If is set to `true`, the property is ignored. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示自定义 。The following code example illustrates a customized . 通过继承 类，此自定义版本具有典型 的所有功能。By inheriting the class, this custom version has all the functionality of a typical . 更改构造函数中的各种属性值提供了独特的外观。Changing various property values in the constructor provides a unique appearance. 由于 属性设置为 false，因此自定义控件也会重写 方法，以便在单击节点时展开和折叠节点。Because the property is set to false, the customized control also overrides the method so that nodes can be expanded and collapsed when they are clicked. 以这种方式自定义的控件可以在整个组织中使用，从而可以轻松地提供一致的接口，而无需在每个单独的项目中指定控件属性。A control that is customized in this way can be used throughout an organization, making it easy to provide a consistent interface without requiring the control properties to be specified in each individual project. remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当 `true` 属性值时，才会在根树节点旁显示加号和减号按钮。The plus sign and minus sign buttons appear next to the root tree nodes only if the property value is `true`. 如果未显示加号和减号按钮，则不存在视觉提示，指示树节点包含子树节点且可展开。If the plus sign and minus sign buttons are not displayed, no visual cue exists to indicate that the tree node contains child tree nodes and is expandable. 然后，用户必须双击树节点，以确定它是否包含子树节点、展开它或折叠该节点。The user then must double-click a tree node to determine whether it contains child tree nodes, to expand it, or to collapse it. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示自定义 。The following code example illustrates a customized . 通过继承 类，此自定义版本具有典型 的所有功能。By inheriting the class, this custom version has all the functionality of a typical . 更改构造函数中的各种属性值提供了独特的外观。Changing various property values in the constructor provides a unique appearance. 由于 属性设置为 false，因此自定义控件也会重写 方法，以便在单击节点时展开和折叠节点。Because the property is set to false, the customized control also overrides the method so that nodes can be expanded and collapsed when they are clicked. 以这种方式自定义的控件可以在整个组织中使用，从而可以轻松地提供一致的接口，而无需在每个单独的项目中指定控件属性。A control that is customized in this way can be used throughout an organization, making it easy to provide a consistent interface without requiring the control properties to be specified in each individual project. summary.span: 对 控件中的项进行排序。

span.span: Sorts the items in control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法重新应用默认排序（按节点文本的字母顺序）或由 属性指定的自定义排序。This method reapplies the default sort, which is alphabetical by node text, or a custom sort specified by the property. 如果更改了现有节点的文本或用户移动了节点，则可以使用此方法，并且希望再次对项进行排序。You can use this method if the text of existing nodes is changed or nodes are moved by the user, and you want to sort the items again. > [!NOTE] > 默认排序器使用基于应用程序指定的 的 方法。The default sorter uses the method based on the specified by the application. 这意味着，具有相等值的 对象将按它们添加到 控件的顺序保存。This means that objects with equal value are kept in the order in which they were added to the control. 如果应用了自定义排序，此行为可能会有所不同。This behavior may be different if a custom sort is applied.
